title: Stylish Canberra Stay 5 Minutes from City Centre with Onsite Greek Restaurant
description:
Experience the  sophistication of Canberra with a stay at this stylish hotel, located in the leafy suburb of Turner, just five minutes from the city centre. Find yourself just a short stroll from the city's vibrant dining and shopping precincts, or savour culinary delights at the onsite restaurant, Podilato, serving up traditional Greek cuisine with a modern twist.

With the Australian War Memorial, National Gallery of Australia and Parliament House all within easy reach, this hotel is the perfect base for you to explore Canberra and return to your home-away-from-home with all necessary comforts.
